Here is a bullet list of required visual elements for an image of a Nintendo Switch:

*   Central rectangular console screen unit
*   Display screen on the console unit
*   Left Joy-Con controller
*   Right Joy-Con controller
*   Joy-Con controllers attached to the sides of the console screen unit
*   Analog stick on the left Joy-Con
*   Directional buttons on the left Joy-Con
*   Minus (-) button on the left Joy-Con
*   Shoulder buttons on the left Joy-Con (e.g., L, ZL)
*   Analog stick on the right Joy-Con
*   Face buttons (e.g., A, B, X, Y) on the right Joy-Con
*   Plus (+) button on the right Joy-Con
*   Shoulder buttons on the right Joy-Con (e.g., R, ZR)
